Name: Bubble Strike
About the game: A simple casual game for those who like to pass the time after a hard day, for those who do not need long battles. Bubble strike gives you the ability to shoot balls with the help of a matching color ball gun. If You will shoot down all the balls - proceed to the next level. Also you will be driven by a pressure compressor , pushing balls down to your gun and then the game is over.
